build.buildCommand: echo '--- Creating directories ---' && mkdir -p /app/staticfiles /app/frontend/fbasaving/static && echo '--- Copying backend static to frontend static ---' && cp -rv backend/fbasaving/static/* /app/frontend/fbasaving/static/ && echo '--- Listing frontend static dir ---' && ls -la /app/frontend/fbasaving/static/ && echo '--- Changing to backend dir ---' && cd backend && echo '--- Installing requirements ---' && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && echo '--- Running collectstatic ---' && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput --clear && echo '--- Listing STATIC_ROOT (/app/staticfiles) ---' && ls -la /app/staticfiles && echo '--- Build command finished ---'
